• Kubernetes
  • Universal 
apiVersion: kuma.io/v1alpha1
kind: HostnameGenerator
metadata:
  name: synced-universal-mesh-service
  namespace: kuma-demo
  labels:
    test: label
spec:
  selector:
    meshService:
      matchLabels:
        kuma.io/origin: global
        kuma.io/env: universal
  template: "{{ .DisplayName }}.svc.{{ .Zone }}.mesh.local"

type: HostnameGenerator

  test: label
spec:
  selector:
    meshService:
      matchLabels:
        kuma.io/origin: global
        kuma.io/env: universal
  template: "{{ .DisplayName }}.svc.{{ .Zone }}.mesh.local"
